name: Man Haunt (Arix_Furette)
description:
In a world where naught remains but reality television, a new show emerges: 

Man Haunt: Live!

You are just one of a seemingly endless stream of doomed contestants tasked with navigating the gameshow's next-to-impossible challenges and be the first to claim its mysterious grand prize. But in order to do win, there's a choice...

Slay the monster, or become the monster?

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • J to Dash
  • K to attack
  • L to use special ability

This is a Beginner's Jam #4 submition, made with awesome people:

  • Artists :
    Airborne_Manatee
    Arix_Furette
    Danilo
    Oasi
  • Devs:
    Mouse
    SmelJey
  • Level design:
    Marndog
  • Sound Designers:
    Aarrow
    Actrician
    Tyler
  • Writer:
    SpagersHat

Special thanks to :
Doober that helped with concepts and code, Big_Fox for game design and everyone that helped with ideas, suggestions or help fixing an issue.
